mapper.update: update sys_item set is_del=1 where id in (${ids})

update sys_item set
name =#{name},
p_id=#{p_id},
sort=#{sort},
left_show=#{left_show},
operator=#{operator},
status=#{status},
modify_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id p_id,name from sys_item where p_id=0 and is_del=2
